clues.name: Dead Body
clues.text: To your surprise, Glenn is dead in his hotel room. Who could have done this? You decide to investigate.

clues.name: Bullets
clues.text: After doing some searching in Brent's closet, you discover 2 bullets. A bit odd...

clues.name: Baseball Bat
clues.text: You get into the bathroom and find a baseball bat leaning against the wall. Maybe he just likes the game.

clues.name: Wallet
clues.text: There is a wallet sitting on the counter of the snack bar. How forgetful, why not just take it?

clues.name: Staff ID
clues.text: There is what appears to be a hotel staff ID. This could give access to forbidden areas at the resort...

clues.name: Gun
clues.text: You find a gun on the hotel roof. Why do the hotel staff have this? Taking it would be a good idea, to prevent any trouble.

clues.name: Invitation
clues.text: A mysterious man has handed you a poker invitation. Sounds like fun, lots of money to be made!

clues.name: Vault
clues.text: You somehow made it inside a vault, but it is empty. Something bad is definitely happening.
